acf.title: Head of Capital Development, APAC
acf.bio_copy:
Wes Steinman is Head of Capital Development, APAC and a member of the Firm’s Asia Management Committee. He is responsible for building and developing new and current institutional investor relationships across the Asia-Pacific region.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2012, Wes worked at U.S. Trust Private Wealth Management for almost two years.

Wes received a BA in Kinesiology and Health Sciences with an Economics minor from The College of William & Mary.
